column5: Can anybody give a good approximate count of large leeches in a pound? Trying to figure out number of pounds to buy for trip in July.
Seems to me about 8-10 dozen a pound for larges and 6-8 for jumbos.

Happy ....We buy two pounds for 6 guys one week and usally have some left over. Purchaseing a lb of Leechs and guessing how many there are is like balancing your wifes checkbook.....just keep putting more in the bucket. We always have a few twister tails and some crankbaits . If the fish are biteing good enough to eat two lbs of Leechs anything will work....Good Luck
Leeches are pretty reasonable so for a seven day fly-in we go with 1 lb./person.
Take a look at the following web site for the information you were after and more:http://www.lolbait.com/index.html
